EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalTaxE.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Income Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalTaxE.description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit associated with share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes, but is not limited to, excess tax benefit.

AdjustmentToAdditionalPaidInCapitalIncom.label: Adjustment to Additional Paid in Capital, Income Tax Effect from Share-based Compensation, Net
AdjustmentToAdditionalPaidInCapitalIncom.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit (deficiency) associated with an share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAmortization.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Amortization (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAmortization.description: For each income statement presented, the amount charged to expense for amortization of capitalized computer software costs.

ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnHedgedItemIn.label: Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Hedged Item in Fair Value Hedge (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnHedgedItemIn.description: The amount recognized in earnings related to the change in fair value during the period of the hedged item in a fair value hedge.

ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnHedgedItemIn.label: Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Hedged Item in Fair Value Hedge
ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnHedgedItemIn.description: Amount of the increase (decrease) in fair value of the hedged item in a fair value hedge recognized in the income statement.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

CommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Shares, Outstanding
CommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of common stock outstanding. Common stock represent the ownership interest in a corporation.

CumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrin.label: Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle Presented on Income Statement, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
CumulativeEffectOfChangeInAccountingPrin.description: This element represents the effect on net income, net of income taxes, of a change in accounting principle reported on the income statement in the period, which occurred before retrospective adjustments were required, recognized by the economic entity. The economic entity includes both controlling and noncontrolling interests.

CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Foreign Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredForeignIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Foreign Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredForeignIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.label: Deferred State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.description: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentageP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Effect of One Percentage Point Decrease on Service and Interest Cost Components (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentageP.description: The effect of a one-percentage- point decrease in the assumed health care cost trend rates on the aggregate of the service and interest cost components of net periodic postretirement health care benefit costs.

DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentageP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Effect of One Percentage Point Decrease on Service and Interest Cost Components
DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentageP.description: Amount of decrease in service and interest cost components of net periodic postretirement benefit cost from one-percentage-point decrease in assumed health care cost trend rate.

DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentageP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Effect of One Percentage Point Increase on Service and Interest Cost Components
DefinedBenefitPlanEffectOfOnePercentageP.description: Amount of increase in service and interest cost components of net periodic postretirement benefit cost from one-percentage-point increase in assumed health care cost trend rate.

EarningsPerShareBasic.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
EarningsPerShareBasic.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

FeesAndCommissionsOther.label: Fees and Commissions, Other (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FeesAndCommissionsOther.description: Amount of fee and commission revenue classified as other.

ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBefore.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), before Tax
ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBefore.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

GainLossOnFairValueHedgeIneffectivenessN.label: Gain (Loss) on Fair Value Hedge Ineffectiveness, Net
GainLossOnFairValueHedgeIneffectivenessN.description: Amount of gain (loss)recognized in the income statement from the hedging ineffectiveness of a fair value hedge.

IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.label: Income Tax Examination, Penalties and Interest Expense
IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.description: The sum of the amounts of estimated penalties and interest recognized in the period arising from income tax examinations.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestExpenseJuniorSubordinatedDebentu.label: Interest Expense, Junior Subordinated Debentures
InterestExpenseJuniorSubordinatedDebentu.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on junior subordinated debentures. Includes amortization of expenses incurred in the issuance of subordinated notes and debentures.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

InterestRevenueExpense.label: Segment Reporting Information, Interest Income or Expense, Net (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
InterestRevenueExpense.description: Amount of interest revenue net of interest expense for the reportable segment. Reporting interest revenue net of interest expense is permitted only when a majority of the segment's revenues are from interest and the chief operating decision maker relies primarily on net interest revenue to assess the performance of the segment and make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment.

LossContingencyLossInPeriod.label: Loss Contingency, Loss in Period
LossContingencyLossInPeriod.description: The amount of loss pertaining to the specified contingency that was charged against earnings in the period, including the effects of revisions in previously reported estimates.

LossContingencyRangeOfPossibleLossMaximu.label: Loss Contingency, Range of Possible Loss, Maximum (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LossContingencyRangeOfPossibleLossMaximu.description: The estimated maximum amount of possible loss from the contingency.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.label: New Accounting Pronouncement or Change in Accounting Principle, Effect of Change on Net Income (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.description: Amount of the effect of a change in accounting principle on net income.

NoninterestExpense.label: Noninterest Expense
NoninterestExpense.description: Total aggregate amount of all noninterest expense.

NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.label: Noninterest Income, Other Operating Income
NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.description: Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeCumulativeEffect.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, Net of Taxes (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeCumulativeEffect.description: The after tax effect on other comprehensive income of a change in accounting principle recognized in the period, which occurred before retrospective adjustments were required, or is in lieu of retrospective adjustments.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.description: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherNoninterestExpense.label: Other Noninterest Expense
OtherNoninterestExpense.description: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.

OtherOperatingIncome.label: Other Operating Income
OtherOperatingIncome.description: The total amount of other operating income, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.label: Preferred Stock Dividends, Income Statement Impact
PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.description: The amount of preferred stock dividends that is an adjustment to net income apportioned to common stockholders.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

SegmentReportingInformationIncomeLossBef.label: Segment Reporting Information, Income (Loss) before Income Taxes (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
SegmentReportingInformationIncomeLossBef.description: Amount of income or loss for the reportable segment before income taxes and extraordinary items.

SegmentReportingInformationIncomeTaxExpe.label: Segment Reporting Information, Income Tax Expense (Benefit) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
SegmentReportingInformationIncomeTaxExpe.description: Amount of income tax expense or benefit attributed to a reportable segment.

SegmentReportingInformationInterestIncom.label: Segment Reporting Information, Interest Income (Expense), Net (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
SegmentReportingInformationInterestIncom.description: Amount of interest revenue net of interest expense for the reportable segment. Reporting interest revenue net of interest expense is permitted only when a majority of the segment's revenues are from interest and the chief operating decision maker relies primarily on net interest revenue to assess the performance of the segment and make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment. In all other segment disclosure situations, interest revenue must be reported separately from interest expense.

SegmentReportingInformationNoninterestEx.label: Segment Reporting Information, Noninterest Expense (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
SegmentReportingInformationNoninterestEx.description: Total amount of expenses, other than interest, for the reportable segment. Must be disclosed if the amount (a) is included in the measure of segment profit or loss reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) is otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in that measure of segment profit or loss.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncomeTaxExpenseB.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from effect of Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017MeasurementPeriod.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Measurement Period Adjustment, Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017MeasurementPeriod.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for measurement period adjustment from accounting for tax effect pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ReclassificationF.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Reclassification from AOCI to Retained Earnings, Tax Effect
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ReclassificationF.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for reclassification to retained earnings of tax effect from remeasurement of deferred tax pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForA.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Income Tax Expense
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForA.description: Amount of income tax expense from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.label: Undistributed Earnings of Foreign Subsidiaries
UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.description: Amount of undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiaries intended to be permanently reinvested outside the country of domicile.

VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.label: Variable Interest Entity, Reporting Entity Involvement, Maximum Loss Exposure, Amount
VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.description: The reporting entity's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

OtherInterestAndDividendIncome.label: Other Interest and Dividend Income
OtherInterestAndDividendIncome.description: Amount, after discount, accretion and premium amortization, of interest income and dividend income classified as other.
